Thank you

How to help...

Package

Please make sure to package your PPE securely so that it reaches us safely and ready for use:

  • We ask donors to break their items into no more than 30kg in weight.
  • Packages must be very well wrapped and suitable for postage.

Visit annpost.ie for information about offices and packaging.

Your devlivery

Items can be delivered to any of the 120 Án Post Depots around the country.

Send your items to:

PPE Materials Appeal
St James Hospital
FREEPOST
James Street
Dublin 8
D08 NHY1

View the map below for an Án Post drop-off location near you.
